summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Journal & Life Tracker app. Fixed critical backend date serialization issues. All core features working correctly including journal entries, life tasks, progress tracking, and navigation.

fixed_bugs.fix_applied: Updated prepare_for_mongo function and added model_to_mongo_dict helper

minor_issues.issue: Journal entry creation returns 400 when entry exists for same date

design_issues.issue: Teal colors not detected by automated script but visually present in UI
affected_selectors: Sidebar active states, dashboard cards, progress bars
design_issues.note: Teal colors are present visually but may be applied via CSS classes rather than inline styles

accessibility_warnings.issue: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent
accessibility_warnings.note: Console warnings for accessibility - should add proper ARIA descriptions

passed_tests: Backend API connection and basic endpoints
Journal entry CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
Frontend navigation between Dashboard, Journal, and Life Tracker
Life task creation with form validation
action_item_for_E1: Minor improvements recommended: 1) Add proper ARIA descriptions to dialog components for accessibility, 2) Consider adding visual indicators for teal color scheme detection in automated tests
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py - Fixed date serialization for MongoDB compatibility
